content: for you r24 single_crochet in each stitch until the end of the round and slip_stitch into the first single_crochet continue rounds of single_crochet until you are 3cm or 1 from the desired length of the hat i went to round 26 r27 chain 2 counts as 1 double_crochet double_crochet in each following stitch until the end of the round slip_stitch into the second chain r28 single_crochet in each stitch until the end of the round and slip_stitch into the first single_crochet sew in threads turn the hat inside out and your hat is complete
